quote: Imagine one out of every five items at the grocery store all being made by the same company. That's the scale that we're talking about here.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the massive scale of the Compass acquisition in a relatable way.
suggested_hook: What if one company controlled 20% of the real estate market?

quote: Your clients do not care what brokerage you're a part of. They remember who you are.
why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to focus on personal branding over brokerage identity.
suggested_hook: Do your clients really care about your brokerage?
